Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT VALUE(COUNT(*)0)
FROM seguros.v0histsini
 
WHERE  T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO  =  :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
  AND  T2.COD_OPERACAO           =  T1.OPERACAO
  AND  T2.IND_TIPO_FUNCAO  =  'IN'
  AND  T2.IDE_SISTEMA            = 'SI'
  AND  T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO   IN  ('PRE','LIB','IN')
  AND  T1.SITUACAO          <>  '2'
/
 END SQL
